(a while more buddies and I'll told his name::

:: Hawk male bot::

The hawk smiled at Triniy's question, he felt
curiosity  as them.

"Ok. we can eat something and talk. Where'll we go?
where do you rather land? "

--- logomorph@... wrote:
> Trinity:
> 
> She shrugged her shoulders,"I don't know."  SHe
> called out to the 
> flying bot. "HEY! Mister? What's your name and would
> you like to get 
> something to eat with us?" she said  in a high
> pitched, cheerful 
> voice.  She didn't really have any fear of the bot,
> more like 
> childlike curiousity.  ON the ship, she only knew
> the crew nad her 
> family.  They were all pretty much like her. Now she
> ahd a whole 
> world to explore and find.  She looked again at the
> bot,"Say, What 
> are you, I never saw anything like you before."  She
> had a big smile 
> onher face.
>
